page.title: 14Ambitions
page.content:
10-year old children were asked what they hoped to achieve in the future. Most children wanted to own a car. The second most popular "dream" was to live in a big house and have lots of money.Other dreams included:
Managing an airport Owning a horse Owning a trendy shop, Running a computer shop Becoming a Pop singer
Here is a what one person wrote about their dream:
The thing I would like most is to live on a farm with lots of animals, but most of them would be horses.It would have an indoor riding school.It would be very big and nice.
